title: Handle Accessible Seating Request
description: A fan with a disability needs to purchase tickets in an accessible seating area.

tasks.description: Identify the fan's needs (e.g., wheelchair accessible seating).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands the specific seating requirement.

tasks.description: Check the availability of accessible seating for the desired game.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds available wheelchair accessible seats.

tasks.description: Process the sale of the accessible seats and provide information about accessible entrances and amenities at the stadium.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent completes the sale and provides helpful information to the fan.
